  "last_message_of_user": "Hello",
  "guidelines": [],
  "insights": [
    "The user greeted me and is likely expecting a response that continues the conversation beyond a simple greeting",
    "I already greeted the user in my last message, so I should avoid repeating a greeting"

  "response_preamble_that_was_already_sent": "Hello.",
